constituent: bowl, metal, gold, origin, book, tree, wood, one
heisigStory: Let bowl suggest a large and heavy golden bowl into which you are throwing all the books you own to mash them into pulp, for some outrageous reason you will have to think up yourself.
koohiiStory1: This is the BOWL of an alchemist: see how he mixes metals in his bowl, as he follows the instructions from his book?
koohiiStory2: If I was begging with a BOWL, I would want GOLD and BOOKS.
myStory: bát. gốc bằng vàng là bát
readingExamples: 鉢 (はち), 植木鉢 (うえきばち)
